meanings.definition: Ornamental work of fine wire formed into delicate tracery
meanings.sent1: The jewelry box was adorned with beautiful filigrees.
meanings.sent2: The artist crafted intricate filigrees on the silver bracelet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the filigrees to decorate its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like delicate filigrees, weaving through her mind.
meanings.sent5: The filigrees on the gate sparkled in the sunlight, mesmerizing all who passed by.

meanings.sent1: She carefully filigreed the wedding cake with frosting.
meanings.sent2: The tailor filigreed the dress with lace trim.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to filigree their sandcastle with seashells.
meanings.sent4: His words filigreed her heart with warmth and affection.
meanings.sent5: The artist filigreed the mural with vibrant colors, bringing it to life.

meanings.definition: Delicate and intricate patterns or designs
meanings.sent1: The wallpaper featured elegant filigrees in soft pastel colors.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror had intricate filigrees along its edges.
meanings.sent3: The pastry chef created filigrees on the cake using chocolate drizzle.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was adorned with delicate filigrees that shimmered in the light.
meanings.sent5: The garden gate was a masterpiece of filigrees, welcoming visitors with its beauty.
